newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Grand Metropolitan cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Grand Metropolitan cut.

text.p: -- SBC Warburg analyst Chris Jakubik said Thursday he cut his rating on Grand Metropolitan Plc to hold from add after the stock hit his target price of $30 a share.
-- Grand Met American Depositary Receipt (ADR) shares closed on Wednesday at 29-3/4.

-- Jakubik said the excellent performance of Grand Met's Pillsbury operations, compared with U.S. food counterparts, and the progressive recovery at International Distillers & Vinters are now fully reflected in the stock.
